ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Eldrig the Old
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve been camping it for 2 weeks now, have yet to see the harmonic or the skull. Just stupid supple scale armbands. = ( On the bright side, I did manage to nab
ygData.messageBody:
I've been camping it for 2 weeks now, have yet to see the harmonic or the
skull. Just stupid supple scale armbands. = (

On the bright side, I did manage to nab a skean the other day while helping
a rogue guildy.

-----Original Message-----
From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
[mailto:garramone@...]
Sent: Wednesday, January 24, 2001 12:18 PM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Eldrig the Old


wow really? on a crowded night if skel tower and warlord/hands are camped,
you can walk in untouched and loot an unneeded skull. they are a fairly
common drop. even better, go camp it and get a harmonic dagger in the
process, if you don't have one already =)

Shada

> So far, aside from the big pieces (scales and guts) the most
> elusive item is
> proving to be the skull from karnor's.
>
> Draelon Stormsong
> Minstrel of Karana
> Tribunal Server

Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
